titleStmt.title: A poem to His Sacred Majesty, on the plot. Written by a gentlewoman
titleStmt.author: Ephelia, fl. 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Mrs. Joan Philips.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard
